section.name: Imports
section.p: An <import> directive instructs the library to include an external module definition into the library. Importing a module enables projects and resources declared within modules to reference resources as <dependencies> via <include> elements.

section.name: Example
section.p: The above example includes module defintions for the JUnit, Ant and JGoodies projects into a library. Link URIs may may include the 'link' or 'artifact' protocol.
